critique: This document is an executive order that extends the exemption of Dr. George F. Bowerman from compulsory retirement for one year. It is difficult to assess the political bias of this document as it pertains to a specific individual and does not have broad implications. The extension of the exemption could be seen as a slight expansion of executive power, but it is minimal. There is no clear indication of ideological tilt, immigration approach, federalism, national security vs. civil liberties, economic regulation, or social inclusion.
